short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for fast access to Salesforce pages via context menu shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SF Quick Links is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your Salesforce experience by providing instant access to essential Salesforce pages. With this extension, users can quickly navigate to important sections of Salesforce using context menu shortcuts. Whether you are managing users, profiles, roles, permissions, or navigating through reports and dashboards, SF Quick Links simplifies the process with just a right-click.

How to Use SF Quick Links:
1) Install the Extension:
 - Download and install the SF Quick Links Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store.

2) Enable the Extension:
 - After installation, the extension will be automatically enabled in your browser. Ensure it's active by checking your browser's extension toolbar.

3) Right-click on a Salesforce Page:
 - Navigate to any Salesforce page within the domains supported (e.g., *.salesforce.com, *.force.com, etc.).
 - Right-click anywhere on the page to open the context menu.

4) Select "SF Quick Link":
 - From the context menu, youâ€™ll see an option labeled "SF Quick Link". Hover over it to view the list of available pages.

5) Choose the Desired Salesforce Page:
 - Click on any of the following pages you want to quickly navigate to:
    a) Setup
    b) Users
    c) Permission Set
    d) Profiles
    e) Roles
    f) Permission Set Group
    g) Queues
    h) Flows
    i) Report
    j) Dashboard
    k) App Manager
    l) Developer Console

6)  Automatic Redirect:
 - After selecting the page, the extension will automatically redirect you to the corresponding page within Salesforce.

7)Repeat as Needed:
 - You can continue using the right-click menu to navigate between Salesforce pages, making your workflow faster and more efficient.
